row.Text: Please enter a customer name before continuing.
This part is not illustrated in the catalog
Please enter your user name, email address and server address. If you are unsure of these, please contact your systems administrator.
Do you really want to delete this item?
Receiving Header information from DMS do you want to import this?
Order transferred successfully. The DMS awaits finalization of this order.
These items are Non Serviced Parts and cannot be supplied on their own. Order these parts from your local supplier or refer to the corresponding parts list.
This part cannot be viewed as it is not illustrated in the catalog.
The email address is not valid.
[x] could not be found in the data.
There are currently parts in the Order List. If you continue the Order List will be lost. Click Cancel to return to the current order.
Please select the quantity you wish to order.
Unable to Log on. Please check the user name and password.
Please enter a valid email address.
There is no Service data available.
The version of Microcat you are running needs to be updated.
Show long descriptions for model symbol names
The selected vehicle is produced in an overseas plant (not in Korea) and the provided vehicle information is insufficient
therefore Microcat could require you to make a selection for part numbers from inconsistent search results.
Display the image at actual size.
Resize the image to fit the page width.
Drag the image in any direction.
Get the most out of Microcat MARKET. Find the tips and tricks, training materials, special offers and more information at microcatmarket.com
I have read and agree with the privacy policy.
I have read and agree with the terms of the EULA.
Thank you for your feedback. This has been submitted successfully.
Please note that aged vehicles have a limited level of interpretation. Check the information from the vehicle to confirm correct interpretation.
If you still require assistance please contact your Kia Distributor.
Remove dash when copying part number
If you need assistance, please contact Customer Service.
The Customer Tag has been saved.
This callout is not cataloged in the section. Click on the callout to perform a Basic Number search for [x].
This callout is not cataloged in the section. Click on the callout to perform an Identification Number search for [x].
Resize the image to fit the page height.
Do you really want to delete this order?
Transfer the Order List to your DMS.
Do you really want to delete this Customer Tag?
This order was created by [x], provided by Infomedia Ltd.
Do you really want to delete the selected items?
The application failed to load the Customer Tags list. Please try again later.
The application failed to open the selected order. The order may have been deleted by another user or there was an error processing the order.
This item is a Non Serviced Part and cannot be supplied on its own. Order the part from your local supplier or refer to the corresponding part list.
The application failed to load the vehicle catalogs and will close. Please try to log in again.
The application failed to retrieve the vehicle attributes. This may cause interpretation errors when searching for parts. Try loading the vehicle attributes again or enter a VIN.
The application could not return any search result. Please check your entry and try again.
The application failed to process this search criteria. Please try again later.
The application failed to retrieve the Customer Tag. Please try again later.
The application failed to retrieve the Customer Tag. Please check your entry and try again.
The application failed to delete the Customer Tag. Please try again later.
The application failed to save the Customer Tag. Please try again later.
The application failed to identify the part you are searching for. Please try again later.
The application failed to load the selected section. Go back to the start of the Graphic Index and try again.
The application failed to load the navigation breadcrumbs for this catalog. You can navigate through the sections using the Graphic Index.
The application failed to perform the supersession search for the selected part. Please try again later.
The EULA cannot be displayed. Please try again later.
The feedback form has not been sent to Infomedia. Please try again later.
The application failed to send the selected order by email.
The application failed to save the selected order. Please try again later.
The application failed to transfer the selected order to the DMS. Please check that your DMS application is running. You may need to restart the DMS application to continue.
The application failed to load the list of orders. Please try again later.
Error loading the list of orders
The order status cannot be displayed. Please log off from the application and log on again.
The application failed to delete the selected order. Please try again later.
The selected parts cannot be added to the Order List. Please try again later.
Error adding parts to Order List
The Order List cannot be cleared. Please try again later.
The application failed to load your information and will close. Please log on again.
The settings you have entered cannot be saved. Please check the information and try again.
The version information cannot be displayed. Please close the window and try later.

An unexpected error has occurred. Click Send exception to send this error to our technicians for review. Click Ignore to continue working. Note that the application can remain unstable, we recommend to close it and log on again.

The application failed to load the list of languages for the parts description. You can still use the application in your preferred language but you will only be able to view the parts data in English.
Error loading list of parts description languages
The application failed to load the part description list. You can still use the application but you will only be able to search for parts by description.
Error loading list of part description
The application failed to load the list of part formats. You can still use the application but you will only be able to view the part numbers.
Error loading list of part format
The application failed to load the price level list. You can still use the application but you will only be able to view the retail price for each part.
The application failed to load the order type list. You can still use the application but you will only be able to create invoices.
The application failed to load the Training resources. Please try again later. In the meantime, you can use the screen tips.
The application failed to initialize and will close. Please try to log in again.

Your session has expired and you have been logged off from the application. The application may have reached the inactivity time limit or your user name and password are being used by another user. Please enter your user name and password to log on again.
Display parts according to the vehicle they belong to.
Do you really want to clear the Order List?
Transfer this part to your DMS.
This part is displayed in the following illustrations:
Filter the search results of the current page
Your search returned [x] results. Only 200 results are displayed in this page.
To see more results, please click on a page number.
To refine your search, go back to the Vehicle Information and select as many vehicle attributes as you can.
Search for a vehicle by VIN. Other search types will be available based on your region.
You can search by partial VIN (last 8 characters).
Search for a vehicle by catalog details.
Select all the known details of the vehicle.
View details of a vehicle that has been identified by a VIN.
When identifying a vehicle by catalog, select the major attributes to refine your search.
View, load or delete Customer Tags.
Select a Customer Tag, and click Load to retrieve the associated vehicle.
Locate parts using a range of search types such as part number or description.
Click the Cross Catalog checkbox to search for a part across all vehicle catalogs.
View the supersession chain for the selected part.
Click the checkbox to add a part to the order.
View the part information such as number, quantity and price.
Click Order to add the part to the order.
Select the required part from the list of parts.
Unable to order these items as they are no longer available.
Unable to order this item as it is no longer available.
This part is not applicable to the current specification. Do you still want to order it?
These parts are not applicable to the current specification. Do you still want to order them?
The application failed to process the list of brands.
Error processing the list of brands

Display a graphical view of the index.
Display a text-based view of the index.
View the part in the image.
Order the number of parts displayed in the Qty field.
The components of this Parts list cannot be ordered by themselves. Please refer to the part number of the corresponding assembly part.
There are currently parts in the Order List. If you continue, the Order List will be lost. Do you really want to change market?
Error loading the list of abbreviations
The application failed to load the list of abbreviations. Please try again later.
This color is already used. Please choose a different color.
Multiple errors have occurred. Click More Details to view details about the errors.
Add a note for this section.
Go to the Reference Library screen.
You have items in the Order List. Would you like to clear the Order List?
There are currently parts in the Order List. If you continue, the Order List will be lost. Do you really want to change region?
Click to see the entire note.
Open the reference file as a PDF.
The application failed to retrieve the note.
Transfer the Order List to EDIX.
Type a shortcut and press Enter on the keyboard.
You have declined the EULA. Please close your browser.
View, load or delete saved orders.
Double-click directly on an order to load the Order List.
View and edit parts on the Order List. You can also print, save or email the Order List.
Add customer details in the Customer tab of the Order List.
Enter the part details of a non-cataloged part.
Microcat data, training issues and other general questions
Transfer these parts to your DMS.
Microcat did not find the VIN entered and has automatically decoded the VIN.
Send a part enquiry to the DMS.
Send a customer enquiry to the DMS. Use a full or partial customer name or account number.
Connect to your DMS by entering your logon details.
Use Internet Explorer to access D2DLink.

Locate parts using a range of search types such as PNC or description. If searching by PNC, enter one or multiple PNCs separated by a space. If searching by description, enter one or multiple words in any order.
Trying to connect to the DMSi...
Successfully connected to the DMSi. Log on to the DMS.
Unable to connect to the DMSi. Check the parameters and ensure that the DMSi is running.
Successfully logged on to the DMS.
Unable to log on to the DMS. Check that the DMS is running and try again.
Successfully logged off from the DMS.
Failed to log off from the DMS.
Your search returned multiple customers. Select a customer from the list.
Your search returned one customer. The application is loading the customer and vehicle details.
Your search did not return any results. Enter alternative criteria and try again.
The application is loading the customer and vehicle details.
The customer details have been loaded. No vehicle is associated with this customer.
All the customer details have been loaded.
Your search did not return any result. Enter a full part number and try again.
Some of the pricing information is temporarily unavailable. Please contact Customer Service.
All the pricing information has now been restored.
Watch this demonstration to get started with Microcat.
Watch this instructor-led training session to get the most out of Microcat.
Watch these videos to get more out of Microcat.
Click to watch the product demonstration.
Click to watch the recorded live webinar.
Click to go to the See and Learn videos.
Register for an upcoming instructor-led webinar.
* Contact Customer Service for licensing details.
This feature is not supported by the current DMSi. Please install the latest DMSi sent by Infomedia or check “Other DMS connections".
The price of the selected part has been updated. Please log off from Microcat and log on again to ensure the latest pricing information is displayed.
Please enter a customer account number before continuing.
This feature is only available online.
No authorised dongle was found. Please close the application and contact Customer Service for assistance.
The application failed to send the vehicle information by email. Please try again later.
The application failed to send the section information by email. Please try again later.
Transfer Microcat.Network data to Superservice Menus.
* You can only transfer data for one VIN at a time to Superservice Menus.
There are currently parts on the Order List. Click Append to add the parts to the Order List. Click Overwrite to replace the parts on the Order List.
Export the Order List for EDOS.
The application could not export the Order List. Please try again later.
The Order List was successfully exported and is ready to be imported in EDOS.
